entry.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
entry.summary: I share my journey through AI, computer vision, healthcare research, and full-stack development. Dive into my projects, papers, and coding journey.
entry.content:
Welcome to My Portfolio

Hi, I‚Äôm Nishi Kanta Paul, and this space showcases my work‚Äîfrom real-time AI research to software engineering projects. I‚Äôve contributed to healthcare research (e.g., Parkinson's diagnosis), published in IEEE conferences, and solved 3000+ algorithmic problems.

You‚Äôll find my projects on GitHub, covering topics like driver distraction detection, misinformation detection, encrypted diaries, and React/Node apps.

A little about me: I enjoy watching CID, love football and basketball, and follow UFC MMA passionately. üòè

A Small Bucket List (Will grow in the future)

  • Attend a live UFC match
  • Visit the 7 wonders of the world

Also, has anyone actually worn a hoodie and felt warm? Not me.

Here‚Äôs a quote that inspires me:

‚ÄúIf you love it, you‚Äôll teach yourself. If you don‚Äôt love it, others will teach you‚Äù

‚Äî Yukitaka Yamaguchi

Thanks for stopping by!

Best,
Nishi Kanta Paul
